data.name: Sherlock Holmes Chapter One Original Game Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy the original soundtrack for Sherlock Holmes Chapter One, featuring two and a half hours of music produced in-house by Frogwares.

To convey the fascinating atmosphere of the island of Cordona, our sound designer and composer Viacheslav Pakalin has created a unique mix of classical Sherlockian tunes with a thrilling Mediterranean flavour. A wide range of instruments has been used to emphasise the diverse and vivid ambience of the game, including but not limited to, piano, violin, hammered dulcimer, percussion, and duduk.
